        Create a menu item and add it to menu
        Parameters:
        menu - menu to add item to
        type - type of menu
        text - displayed text
        command - the action command string
        image - icon
        acceleratorKey - shortcut key
        toolTip - string for tooltip
        action - action listener
        Returns:
        menu item created
